segments.text: Wait, is that water coming out of the sink like a waterfall?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I didn't expect to see the basin overflowing onto the counter.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is right there, but she's not reacting at all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot's in the puddle—how is she missing this?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And those kids! The boy's on a stool reaching into the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool's wobbling; I can't believe it's holding him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's waiting with her hand up for a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're being so secretive behind the mom.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window shows a normal garden; this inside is wild.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes stacked high, and water everywhere—shocking combination.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I never thought I'd see mischief and flood at once.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The faucet's still running full; that's unexpected.
segments.speaker: PAR
